exercises.description: Start on plank position on your forearms. Pull your body back and forth, alternating the angle of the arms from 90º -> 45º -> 90º -> 135º
exercises.name: Advanced Pulse Plank

exercises.description: This is a cardio exercise you need to do at full speed. Get a step or a box and go up and down, alternating both legs, engaging the quads and the glutes.
exercises.name: Alternate jumping step up

exercises.description: Hold a barbell on your shoulders in front of your head and perform a squat.
exercises.name: Barbell Front Squats

exercises.description:
Crouch down with hands in front of you shoulder-width apart and feet behind you with hips up in the air and eyes forward.
Crawl forward starting with your right hand and your left foot following with the left hand and the right foot. Then Crawl backward until reach the starting position.
exercises.name: Bear Crawl

exercises.description: Begin in a standing position. >Move into a squat position with your hands on the ground. > Kick your feet back into a plank position > Perform a push up > Return  your feet into squat position >Stand up from the squat position > Do a vertical jump
exercises.name: Burpee

exercises.description: Touch your butt with your heels
exercises.name: Butt kicks

exercises.description: The diamond push up is an pretty advanced form of this classic exercise. It's commonly used as a warm-up in the Army. You place your hands in a diamond shape, lower yourself to the ground and push back up. This targets your chest as well as your abs.
exercises.name: Diamond Push up
Dollyo Chagui
exercises.description: A cuatro patas realizar patada circular con empiene sin bajar la rodilla
Elbow to knee crunch
exercises.name: Elbow to knee crunch

exercises.description:
Also called Farmer's Carry. 

Whether you’re holding the weight at your sides, overhead, or anywhere in between, keep your shoulders as tight as possible to improve joint stability. Straighten Your Back, Grip Hard, Step Lightly, Tuck Your Chin and Go Heavy.
exercises.name: Farmer's Walk

exercises.description: Your hands will be in the normal push-up position put your feet will be closer to your hands then the normal push-up. Your knees will be bent at 90° and the only part of your body that will be moving is your elbows. Lower your upper body down until your nose touches the ground, and then push back up.
exercises.name: Frog Pushup

exercises.description: Starting in Gorilla position, do a step aside first using your arms to do a lateral jump with both legs to be again in the Gorilla position again. Afterwards bring yourself in a plank position and quickly go back to Gorilla position. Repeat the sequence.
exercises.name: Gorilla sequence

exercises.description:
Raise legs and back off the ground and do a scissor movement horizontally.

You can put yout hands under your glutes for an easier exercise.

Have your hands in front, without touching the ground for a harder approach.
exercises.name: Horizontal Scissors
Hostages
exercises.description: In a wide squat position move up and down. Stying low, parallel to the floor

exercises.name: Jumping jacks
exercises.description: Open and close legs as you raise and lower your arms
Exercise starts with two kettlebells on the floor. Bent over your back, keeping it straight, and row the kettlebell up and towards the hip, pulling from the elbow and not the upper back.
exercises.name: Kettlebell Bent-Over Row

exercises.description:
Exercise starts with the kettlebell on the floor. Do a squat to grab the kettlebell with one hand and drive up from the bottom of the squat and continue the momentum upwards and press the kettlebell overhead.

Alternate both arms.
exercises.name: Kettlebell Thruster

exercises.description: This is basically a diamond pushup but placing both hands on a laid kettlebell
exercises.name: Kettlebell diamond pushup

exercises.description: Get a Kettlebell or a plate and raise it with the arms extended
exercises.name: Kettlebell/Plate front raise

exercises.description:
Begin in a high plank position.
In one sweeping motion, rotate your body to the left and kick your right leg through. Using your left arm, touch your hand to your toe. 
Bring your hand and foot back to high plank position, and repeat on the opposite side, touching your right hand to your left foot.
exercises.name: Kick Throughs

exercises.description:
Lay on your back and start touching your ankles, one time each side to engange the lateral abs.

If ankles feel easy grab your tibias.
exercises.name: Lateral ankle abs

exercises.description:
1)  Standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, take one generous stride backwards into a deep lunge and hold for a few seconds.

2) Drive the same leg in an upwards motion towards your chest into a knee raise, straightening your standing leg. After pausing, lunge leg back again for next rep.
exercises.name: Lunge With Knee Raise

exercises.description: Regular lunges but you jump vertically to change the stance.
exercises.name: Lunges with jump

exercises.description: Regular push up but spending X seconds on each segment. For instance 10 seconds to go down, 10 seconds holding down (not touching the floor) and 10 seconds to go up. At the same speed.
exercises.name: Master Lee's Push Up

exercises.description: Get 2 medicine ball, put your feet on them and perform a pushup
exercises.name: Medicine ball Feet Pushup

exercises.description: Start in a plank position, pull your right knee into your chest, quickly switch and pull the left knee in, Continue to switch knees.
exercises.name: Mountain Climbers

exercises.description: Regular static plank
exercises.name: Plank

exercises.description: Regular plank but elevate one leg and then the other during the whole duration
exercises.name: Plank leg elevation

exercises.description: Move the legs to the side
exercises.name: Plank leg side motions

exercises.description: Regular plank but extend one and and then the other, non stop during the whole duration.
exercises.name: Plank punches

exercises.description: On a plank position go up (arms straight) and down, continuously.
exercises.name: Plank up and down

exercises.description: Hang on to a pull up bar, and raise the knees to the chest.
exercises.name: Pull up bar, knee raises

exercises.description: Start on a regular plank position and start going up an down using your arms. The movement starts from plank, you arrive at a push up position and go back again to plank. In steps.
exercises.name: Push Up Plank

exercises.description: Bring yourself into a high plank position, with your feet to a bit wider than hip-width apart. This will give you more stability. Think about wrapping your shoulders back, but keeping your ribcage knit together. Everything is super engaged in your core.
exercises.name: Regular Pushups

exercises.description: In a Bear Crawl position, pull the body back, bringing the bottom just up your feet, while keeping your knees away from the floor. This is a quadriceps exercise
exercises.name: Rulk Rocking Chair

exercises.description: This is a cardio exercise. Run in place, elevating your knees above the hips, while punching alternatively with both arms.
exercises.name: Running Punches

exercises.description: Elevate your knees as if you were running on the same place
exercises.name: Running knees up

exercises.description: If free weight is too easy, you can use a dumbell or disk to increase resistance.
exercises.name: Russian Twist
Seal jacks
exercises.description: Stand tall with your core braced, chest up, and arms at your sides. Begin the movement by jumping into the air. As you jump, move your legs out to the side. ... Once your feet touch the ground, jump back into the starting position with your legs together and hands at your sides.

exercises.name: Shoulder tap
exercises.description: In a push up position tap your shoulders
Do a lateral lunge and a Squat
exercises.name: Side Lunge Squat

exercises.description: Use your forearm as a base and be still on your side
exercises.name: Side Plank Hold
Siete
exercises.description: En posición de flexiones, hacer un 7 con una rodilla y luego con la otra.

exercises.name: Sodo-se adelante y atrás
exercises.description: Realizar sodo-se adelante y atrás con una pierna y luego con la otra.

Assume a standard pushup position, your body aligned from ankles to head.

As you lower your body toward the floor, lift your right foot, swing your right leg out sideways, and try to touch your knee to your elbow.

Return to the starting position, and repeat with your left leg.
exercises.name: Spiderman Pushup

exercises.description: Squats are one of the most foundational functional movements in our lives.
exercises.name: Squat

exercises.description:
Do a regular squat and as you go up with a explosion twist your waist 90º

The feet end up pointing to the one side on each rep.
exercises.name: Squat + Twist

exercises.description: Squat down and do a vertical jump with both legs stretched
exercises.name: Squat + vertical jump

exercises.description:
Get in plank position with the feet on a stability ball.

Draw your knees in towards your wrists. This will naturally roll the ball in as well.
exercises.name: Stability Ball Knee Tuck Push-Ups
Sumo squat
exercises.description: The Sumo Squat is a lower-body strength exercise that's a variation of a standard squat. ... While all squats work the glutes, hip flexors, quads, hamstrings and calves, the leg positioning of the sumo squat works the inner thighs as well.

exercises.name: Superman Push ups
exercises.description: Do a PushUp and hold in a superman position raising left arm and right leg. Then do the other side.

Start on a push up position and bring a knee to the oposite elbow.

No need to go fast, focus on the abs and core. Turn the body so it is not like a Mountain Climber.
exercises.name: Thor core

exercises.description: Pushup holding the position for 2 seconds in the middle of the range, continue to the lowest position and keep holding 2 more seconds. Repeat the process when going up.
exercises.name: Two Stage Pushups

exercises.description: Rest on your back, with your legs straight, elevate torso and legs forming a V shpe with your body.
exercises.name: V Sits

exercises.description:
Raise legs and back off the ground and do a scissor movement vertically, up and down.

You can put yout hands under your glutes for an easier exercise. 

Have your hands in front, without touching the ground for a harder approach.
exercises.name: Vertical Scissors

exercises.description: Use the vertical rope continuosly to burn your arms
exercises.name: Vertical rope

exercises.description:
Starting position: your index fingers and thumbs so they’re touching, forming a diamond shape.
Lower your chest towards your hands. Stop just before your chest touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.
Change to a wider grip and perform a push up again.
exercises.name: Wide to Diamond Pushup

exercises.description: A cuatro patas realizar patada de empuje lateral sin bajar la rodilla
exercises.name: Yop Chagui
Wide to narrow Squat
exercises.description: Do squats alternating the separation between your legs.

exercises.name: Plane Pushup
exercises.description: Having your legs open perform a pushup while moving forwards or backwards.
Lie on your back, extend your legs and hold them just above the ground. Bring one knee up towards your chest and twist your torso so that the opposite elbow comes over towards it.
exercises.name: Bicycle Abs

exercises.description: Lie down flat on your back on the ground. Keeping your legs as straight as possible, raise them until they’re vertical or as close as you can get. Lower them without touching the ground and repeat.
exercises.name: Leg raise
Crab Walk
exercises.description: Sit on the floor, knees bent and feet flat. Place your hands on the floor under your shoulders, fingers pointing forward. Lift your hips off the floor and walk forwards and backwards.
